name: JWTBearerTokenExchange

constuctors.name: JWTBearerTokenExchange
constuctors.description: Creates an instance of the JWTBearerTokenExchange class using the specified token endpoint and the signed JWT bearer token.

constuctors.name: JWTBearerTokenExchange
constuctors.description: Creates an instance of the Auth.JWTBearerTokenExchange class.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the JWTBearerTokenExchange object.

methods.name: getAccessToken
methods.description: Returns the access_token in the token response to the JWT bearer token request.

methods.name: getGrantType
methods.description: Returns the grant type specified in the JWT bearer token request. The grant type value defaults to urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer.

methods.name: getHttpResponse
methods.description: Returns the full System.HttpResponse token response to the JWT bearer token request.

methods.name: getJWS
methods.description: Returns the JWS specified in the JWT bearer token request.

methods.name: getTokenEndpoint
methods.description: Returns the token endpoint that the JWT bearer token request is POSTed to.

methods.name: setGrantType
methods.description: Sets the grant type in the JWT bearer token request. Returned by the getGrantType() method.

methods.name: setJWS
methods.description: Sets the JWS in the JWT bearer token request. Returned by the getJWS() method.

methods.name: setTokenEndpoint
methods.description: Sets the token endpoint that the JWT bearer token request is POSTed to. Returned by the getTokenEndpoint() method.

description: Contains methods that POST the signed JWT bearer token to a token
